The context of Mike Pence: s statement: The expert's verdict highlights that Mike Pence's statement was cherry-picked and taken out of context by Tim Kaine during his speech. This aspect verifies the authenticity of the claim by providing the correct context in which the statement was made.
Tim Kaine: s history of criticizing Trump: The expert's verdict mentions that Tim Kaine has previously criticized Donald Trump for his comments about the military. This aspect verifies the authenticity of the claim by showing that Kaine has a history of using Trump's statements to criticize him.
Trump: s praise for the military: The expert's verdict mentions that Trump has referred to the active military members as "the greatest men and women on earth."
